paragraph: Mehrak Golestan (Persian: مهرک گلستان) (born 29 December 1983) is a British rapper of Iranian descent. He appeared on the BBC current affairs programme Newsnight on 9 August 2011 discussing the London riots of 2011. He is the son of Iranian photographers Kaveh Golestan and Hengameh Golestan, and the grandson of writer and film director Ebrahim Golestan.
Lost Tapes Vol.1 (Poison and Other Toxins) (2011)
"Dideh Va Del" (with Hichkas, Amin Fooladi, Bidad) (2006)
"Khatteh Man (Remix)" (with Erfan, Khashayar, Afra, Mehrad Hidden) (2008)
"Long Live Palestine Part 2" (with Lowkey feat Dam, Narcy, Eslam Jawaad, Hichkas, Hasan Salaam, Shadia Mansour) (2010)
